yellow.titleLine2: one small good deed at a time

main.subLine1: With Charry, donation is just a few clicks away.
main.subLine2: Support Estonia’s most trustworthy NGOs, receive visual feedback, and earn rewarding and heartwarming badges for your good deeds.
main.smallLine1: Donations can be made anonymously, and 100%
main.smallLine2: of your donation goes directly to the charities.
main.downloadText: Available on IOS and Android devices.
